nodes.bodyText: You're form is not resetting when the modal is closed.  This might be a little tricky as you will need to reset the contents of the markdown as well.
Can you also make the wording a little more descriptive.  I suck at word smithing, but even "Set as priority announcement"
Not sure I understood this one fully, but I tried. Please see 984d376.
Just change the checkbox label from "Priority" to "Set as a priority message"  or something similar.
Hopefully, this is closer. Please see d48a28b.

Checkboxes are a little trickier than this.  I am sure you noticed that it looks a bit off with the label on a different line than the checkbox, makes it feel like the checkbox is a poor orphan child.

This is the way to write it to get it all working together:
<Form.Item name="priority" valuePropName="checked">
   <Checkbox>{i18n("announcement.control.priority")}</Checkbox>
</Form.Item>
